Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.evaluation.outlier

Evaluate an outlier score using a misclassification based cost model.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JudgeOutlierScores
    Compute a Histogram to evaluate a ranking algorithm.
    JudgeOutlierScores.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class.
    OutlierPrecisionAtKCurve
    Compute a curve containing the precision values for an outlier detection method.
    OutlierPrecisionAtKCurve.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class.
    OutlierPrecisionAtKCurve.PrecisionAtKCurve
    Precision at K curve.
    OutlierPrecisionRecallCurve
    Compute a curve containing the precision values for an outlier detection method.
    OutlierPrecisionRecallCurve.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class.
    OutlierPrecisionRecallCurve.PRCurve
    P/R Curve
    OutlierRankingEvaluation
    Evaluate outlier scores by their ranking
    OutlierRankingEvaluation.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class.
    OutlierROCCurve
    Compute a ROC curve to evaluate a ranking algorithm and compute the corresponding ROCAUC value.
    OutlierROCCurve.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class.
    OutlierROCCurve.ROCResult
    Result object for ROC curves.
    OutlierSmROCCurve
    Smooth ROC curves are a variation of classic ROC curves that takes the scores into account.
    OutlierSmROCCurve.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class.
    OutlierSmROCCurve.SmROCResult
    Result object for Smooth ROC curves.
    OutlierThresholdClustering
    Pseudo clustering algorithm that builds clusters based on their outlier score.
    OutlierThresholdClustering.Parameterizer
    Parameterization helper

Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.evaluation.outlier Description

Evaluate an outlier score using a misclassification based cost model.
